title: Isotropic Maxwellian parameters for solar wind protons. - Justin C. Kasper (Smithonian Astrophysical Observatory)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/dscovr/h1/faraday_cup/2016/dscovr_h1_fc_20160603_v02.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 55.5942% of the 800 timesteps. Cadence = 60000000000 [ns] = PT1M.
info.contact: Justin C. Kasper @ Smithonian Astrophysical Observatory

parameters.name: V_GSE_ErrorBars
parameters.description: proton velocity x,y,z-component (with error bars). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['V_GSE']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: THERMAL_SPD
parameters.description: Proton solar winds' most probable thermal speed. (w/o error bars)

parameters.name: THERMAL_SPD_ErrorBars
parameters.description: Proton solar winds' most probable thermal speed. (with error bars). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['THERMAL_SPD']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Np
parameters.description: Scalar solar wind density. (w/o error bars)

parameters.name: Np_ErrorBars
parameters.description: Scalar solar wind density. (with error bars). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Np']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: THERMAL_TEMP
parameters.description: Solar wind proton temperature (w/o error bars)

parameters.name: THERMAL_TEMP_ErrorBars
parameters.description: Solar wind proton temperature (with error bars). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['THERMAL_TEMP']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
